stripped_text: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
text: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
title: BANGUN: When Disaster Strikes
